project_descr: Technical support to UNISDR in the Caribbean to Strengthen the resilience of the Caribbean countries and communities to disasters by increasing awareness surrounding the importance of disaster risk reduction.

outputs.output_descr:
The proposed project will have the following objectives:
Strengthen the resilience of the Caribbean countries and communities to disasters by increasing awareness surrounding the importance of disaster risk reduction:
• Improved capacity for the monitoring and measuring of progress surrounding implementation of DRR action plans in the Caribbean region and countries
• Enhanced regional coordination mechanisms surrounding DRR at the regional level

project_title: technical support to unisdr in the caribbean
